WHY+NAME: Same as WHY, but we append the user's name to the end of the bot utterance. For example: Why did you say that

AVOIDANCE+NAME: Same as AVOIDANCE, but we append the user's name to the bot utterance. For example: I'd rather not talk about that Peter
Note that WHY and AVOIDANCE cannot be combined because they are contradictory, and WHY and CHANGE cannot be combined because we cannot ask two questions in one turn
